meanings.definition: The state or quality of being lysogenic.
meanings.sent1: The lysogenicities of the virus were studied in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Scientists researched the lysogenicities of different viruses.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked about the lysogenicities of the virus during class.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious lysogenicities of the virus intrigued the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained the concept of lysogenicities clearly.

meanings.definition: The ability of a virus to undergo lysogeny.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the lysogenicities of viruses is crucial in virology.
meanings.sent2: The lysogenicities of the virus determine its behavior.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon depicted viruses discussing their lysogenicities.
meanings.sent4: The lysogenicities of the virus spread rapidly through the population.
meanings.sent5: The documentary highlighted the dangerous lysogenicities of certain viruses.
